* Model:Sony Vaio VGN-TZ11VN
* Website: http://vaio.sony.es/view/ShowProduct.action?product=VGN-TZ11VN%2FX&site=voe_es_ES_cons&category=VN+TZ+Series

=== Current Issues ===

Camera Motion Eye: Not working
Sound: All detected as HDA Intel but not sound at all.
Hibernate/Resume: Not Working but in 7.04 it does perfectly, something wrong with Gutsy Gibbons.
Fingerprint reader: Not working out the box, but I think that with bioapi I can make it...we will see.
Starting Session: It stay 10 seconds and then launch. I think something is waiting for something but I don't see any crash.

==== Notes ====
Describe LaptopTestingTeam/SonyVaioVGN-TZ11VN here.

Added support for Ricoh Webcam MotionEye on TFT. Doing lsusb: Bus 005 Device 006: ID 05ca:183a Ricoh Co., Ltd 
This support when from this post on Ubuntu forums. Registered may be requiered for download the patch: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=3514078
